title: Quality Improvement (QI) Process Through Collaborative Learning Based on Virtual Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced professionals in managerial/leadership roles participate in smartphone-based limited-technology environments. Requires formative assessment-centered feedback.

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts of QI process stages at 80%+ proficiency through collaborative learning in virtual simulation environments
Learners can design and implement QI strategies applicable to real work contexts three or more times using mobile microlearning modules
Learners can improve higher-order thinking (analysis/evaluation) competencies by 70%+ through peer collaboration based on psychological safety in virtual environments

resources: Mobile Chat Tool for Collaborative Learning
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
